column4: Can mv work recursively?  For example, I want to mv *.avi from a tree of directories.
no, you need to either use your shell's globbing abilities or find
I'm a little lost.  Is there no simple way to just move all files with a particular namespec to a different directory?
there is, I gave you two
you don't need a live cd
this is offtopic here, so if you have questions please try #apple or similar, but command-s during boot-up will drop you into single user mode on a mac
